text: KPCP (88.3 FM) is a radio station licensed to serve the community of New Roads, Louisiana. The station is owned by Stop the Violence/Save the Children, Inc., and airs a variety format. The station was assigned the KPCP call letters by the Federal Communications Commission on December 27, 2007. ==References== ==External links== * Official Website * FCC Public Inspection File for KPCP * Category:Radio stations in Louisiana Category:Radio stations established in 2011 Category:2011 establishments in Louisiana Category:Variety radio stations in the United States Category:Pointe Coupee Parish, Louisiana
title: KPCP
